full_summary:
## Government Tender Announcement: Dual Monitor Arms

### Title and Reference Information

* **Title:** Statistics Canada: Dual Monitor Arms
* **Reference Number:** cb-732-85431421
* **Amendment Number:** 3
* **Solicitation Number:** J072846A

### Tender Details

* **Publication Date:** February 6, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date:** February 20, 2024 at 14:00:00
* **Contract Start Date:** Expressed as February 21, 2024, and expected to last until March 31, 2024
* **Tender Status:** Expired

### Procurement Information

* **Procurement Category:** Government Department (GD)
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price
* **Regions of Opportunity:** Canada
* **Regions of Delivery:** National Capital Region (NCR), specifically Ottawa, Ontario

### Contractor Information

* **Contracting Entity:** Statistics Canada
* **Contracting Entity Address:** 150 Tunney's Pasture Driveway, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0T6, Canada
* **Contact Person:** Susan Hall, Email: [susan.hall@statcan.gc.ca](mailto:susan.hall@statcan.gc.ca), Phone: (613) 882-2470

### Tender Description

Statistics Canada invites businesses to submit proposals for the purchase and delivery of dual monitor arms to their office in Ottawa, Ontario. The tender is set aside to support Indigenous Business under the federal government’s Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business. The procurement is also set aside from international trade agreements as per Article 800 of the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA). The package includes a notice of proposed procurement (NPP) as per [CBI PDF-LINK](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/31287/rfb-j072846_en.pdf).

### Attachments

The tender documents can be downloaded from the following links:

* [English: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/31287/rfb-j072846_en.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/31287/rfb-j072846_en.pdf)
* [French: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/312
